docs.snippet: Britain may need a transitional agreement to smooth its exit from the European Union but it should not "buy back" into too many of the bloc's regulations, Britain's trade minister Liam Fox said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain may need a transitional agreement to smooth its exit from the European Union but it should not "buy back" into too many of the bloc's regulations, Britain's trade minister Liam Fox said on Sunday.

headline.main: Any Transitional Deal With EU Should Not Diminish Brexit Vote: Minister

docs.snippet: EU leaders have agreed to invite representatives of the European Parliament to participate in meetings to prepare for Britain's departure from the bloc, European Council President Donald Tusk said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: EU leaders have agreed to invite representatives of the European Parliament to participate in meetings to prepare for Britain's departure from the bloc, European Council President Donald Tusk said on Thursday.

headline.main: EU Leaders Agree to Give Parliament Role in Preparing for Brexit Talks: Tusk
headline.print_headline: EU Leaders Agree to Give Parliament Role in Preparing for Brexit Talks: Tusk

docs.snippet: British finance minister Philip Hammond said on Tuesday that the government would not rule out the possibility of continuing to make payments into the European Union budget once it leaves the bloc in order to maintain good access for its exporters...
docs.lead_paragraph: British finance minister Philip Hammond said on Tuesday that the government would not rule out the possibility of continuing to make payments into the European Union budget once it leaves the bloc in order to maintain good access for its exporters.

headline.main: UK Not Ruling Out Continued Budget Payments After Brexit-Hammond
headline.print_headline: UK Not Ruling Out Continued Budget Payments After Brexit-Hammond

docs.snippet: British foreign minister Boris Johnson said on Tuesday that the 18 months the EU's chief negotiator has set for concluding talks with Britain to leave the bloc should be "absolutely ample"....
docs.lead_paragraph: British foreign minister Boris Johnson said on Tuesday that the 18 months the EU's chief negotiator has set for concluding talks with Britain to leave the bloc should be "absolutely ample".

headline.main: Brexit Deal in 18 Months Is Ample Time: Johnson

docs.snippet: U.K. Supreme Court judges were presented with starkly contrasting views of Britain's largely unwritten constitution Tuesday, as they considered whether government or Parliament has the power to lead the country out of the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.K. Supreme Court judges were presented with starkly contrasting views of Britain's largely unwritten constitution Tuesday, as they considered whether government or Parliament has the power to lead the country out of the European Union.

docs.snippet: A senior British cabinet minister sought on Tuesday to assuage concerns in China about market access in the wake of the Brexit vote, pointing to Hong Kong's success as a trading hub as proof of Britain's commitment to keeping its doors open to glo...
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior British cabinet minister sought on Tuesday to assuage concerns in China about market access in the wake of the Brexit vote, pointing to Hong Kong's success as a trading hub as proof of Britain's commitment to keeping its doors open to global business.

headline.main: Senior British Minister Seeks to Calm China Concerns on Brexit
headline.print_headline: Senior British Minister Seeks to Calm China Concerns on Brexit

docs.snippet: The European Union's chief negotiator set a target of agreeing a Brexit deal with Britain by October 2018, assuming London keeps a promise to formally launch the process of leaving the EU by the end of March....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union's chief negotiator set a target of agreeing a Brexit deal with Britain by October 2018, assuming London keeps a promise to formally launch the process of leaving the EU by the end of March.

headline.main: 'Keep Calm and Negotiate': EU Sees October 2018 Brexit Deal
headline.print_headline: 'Keep Calm and Negotiate': EU Sees October 2018 Brexit Deal

docs.snippet: Italian voters' defeat of a referendum on constitutional reforms cannot be compared to Britain's vote to leave the European Union, European Central Bank policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian voters' defeat of a referendum on constitutional reforms cannot be compared to Britain's vote to leave the European Union, European Central Bank policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Monday.

headline.main: ECB's Villeroy: Can't Compare Italy 'No' Vote to Brexit
headline.print_headline: ECB's Villeroy: Can't Compare Italy 'No' Vote to Brexit
